name: Walking Tour San Salvador by EC Tours El Salvador
description: OUR TOUR OFFER FOR EVERYBODY WHO LOVE TO HAVE A GREAT TIME IN A MULTICULTURAL ENVIRONMENT AND AT THE SAME TIME MAKING FRIENDS. THAT’S RIGHT! , YOUNG TRAVELERS, BUSSINES OR SOLO TRAVELERS, AND PEOPLE WHO LOVE CULTURE WILL BE ABLE TO COME WITH US TO DISCOVER THE REAL SALVADORAN CULTURE ON A GENERAL OVERVIEW OF THIS LOVELY COUNTRY. ...
